trans-unit.source: It's important to know that Azure currently works with two deployment models: Resource Manager, and classic.
trans-unit.target: It's important to know that Azure currently works with two deployment models: Resource Manager, and classic.

trans-unit.source: Before you begin your configuration, make sure that you understand the deployment models and tools.
trans-unit.target: Before you begin your configuration, make sure that you understand the deployment models and tools.

trans-unit.source: You'll need to know which model that you want to work in.
trans-unit.target: You'll need to know which model that you want to work in.

trans-unit.source: Not all networking features are supported yet for both models.
trans-unit.target: Not all networking features are supported yet for both models.

trans-unit.source: For information about the deployment models, see [Azure deployment models](../azure-classic-rm.md).
trans-unit.target: For information about the deployment models, see [Azure deployment models](../azure-classic-rm.md).
